legal.entityName: DMF Records Fly Hoolie ENT Co.

branding.officialName: DMF Records Fly Hoolie ENT Co.
branding.tagline: An Integrated Music and Technology Venture

serviceDivisions.name: DMF Records & Fly Hoolie ENT
serviceDivisions.description: Core label operation for DMF artists and imprints, powered by StreamGod analytics.

services.name: Artist Signing & Deal Structuring
services.summary: Custom deal structures with master ownership focus and transparent splits.

services.name: Release Management
services.summary: Full rollout planning from audio delivery to marketing calendar and reporting.

services.name: Catalog Growth Strategy
services.summary: Long-term planning for releases, bundles, deluxe drops, and catalog optimization.

serviceDivisions.name: DMF Worldwide Distributor
serviceDivisions.description: Global digital distribution for DMF and external clients, keeping artists' rights intact.

services.name: Global DSP Delivery
services.summary: Ingestion to all major DSPs (Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube, TikTok, Tidal, Deezer, Amazon, and more).

services.name: Royalty Collection & Accounting
services.summary: Royalty ingestion, matching, split calculations, and statements for artists and partners.

services.name: Content ID & Rights Protection
services.summary: YouTube Content ID, fingerprinting, and duplicate-claim takedowns to protect revenue.

services.name: Distribution Tiers
services.summary: Tiered service levels for indie artists, serious teams, and label/enterprise clients.

serviceDivisions.name: StreamGod AI & Data
serviceDivisions.description: The intelligence layer that scores catalogs, finds opportunity, and automates moves.

services.name: Track Readiness Scoring
services.summary: Scores every track on metadata, mix, artwork, and rollout readiness before distribution.

services.name: Release & Campaign Recommendations
services.summary: AI-powered suggestions on what to drop next, which tracks to push, and where to focus spend.

services.name: Real-Time Performance Dashboards
services.summary: Central dashboards for streams, revenue, campaign ROI, and catalog health.

services.name: 10,000-Bot AI Playground
services.summary: Specialized bots for A&R scouting, marketing, legal prep, analytics, and internal automations.

serviceDivisions.name: The Gavel Syndicate
serviceDivisions.description: DMF's integrated legal arm for IP enforcement, contracts, and regulatory work.

services.name: Contract Drafting & Review
services.summary: Artist, producer, label, and partnership contracts with rights-first structures.

services.name: IP Monitoring & Enforcement
services.summary: Monitoring DSPs, socials, and platforms; filing takedowns and claims for infringements.

services.name: Sample & Sync Clearance
services.summary: Clearance support for samples, beats, and sync placements.

services.name: Policy & Compliance
services.summary: Guidance on platform policies, privacy, and copyright regulations.

serviceDivisions.name: DMF Marketing & Growth
serviceDivisions.description: Paid media, organic plays, and campaign systems centered around real, verifiable growth.

services.name: Full Campaign Buildouts
services.summary: End-to-end marketing campaigns across YouTube, Meta, TikTok, and more.

services.name: Playlist & Editorial Strategy
services.summary: Strategy and support for editorial pitches, third-party playlists, and algorithm triggers.

services.name: Creative Assets
services.summary: Cover art, thumbnails, trailers, and short-form content aligned with DMF visual standards.

services.name: Authentic Growth & Anti-Bot Audits
services.summary: Audits and ongoing monitoring to keep artist traffic clean and industry-safe.

serviceDivisions.name: Artist & Business Services
serviceDivisions.description: Support systems around the music: brand, business, and long-term structure.

services.name: Brand & Image Development
services.summary: Positioning, story, and identity systems for artists and imprints.

services.name: Business & Entity Setup
services.summary: Helping artists formalize LLCs, publishing, PRO registrations, and royalty structures.

services.name: Education & Playbooks
services.summary: Guides, workshops, and internal playbooks powered by StreamGod insights.

serviceDivisions.name: Enterprise & White-Label Platforms
serviceDivisions.description: DMF-built custom platforms and apps for labels, brands, and organizations.

services.name: Custom Streaming & App Builds
services.summary: White-label apps, portals, or streaming hubs for labels, brands, and festivals.

services.name: Enterprise Infrastructure
services.summary: Scalable backend, hosting, and data solutions for large catalogs and teams.

services.name: Integrations & Automation
services.summary: Custom integrations to CRMs, accounting tools, cloud storage, and more.
